mapper.select: SELECT ifnull(c.exp_date, #{expDate}) as exp_date,#{companyId} as company_id,c.user_id,d.user_name, c.exp_type_parent_name,c.exp_type_name,c.seq, c.id,c.exp_amount,c.remark,c.depart_id from maoding_web_exp_fixed c LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user d on c.user_id = d.user_id and c.company_id = d.company_id or d.id = c.user_id where c.company_id = #{companyId} and c.exp_date = #{expDate} order by c.seq

SELECT #{expDate} as exp_date,#{companyId} as company_id, a.id as parent_exp_type,a.name as exp_type_parent_name, b.id as exp_type,b.name as exp_type_name, CONCAT(a.seq,b.seq) as seq from maoding_web_exp_category a INNER JOIN maoding_web_exp_category b on a.id = b.pid INNER JOIN maoding_web_exp_category_relation c on b.id = c.category_type_id where b.company_id = #{rootCompanyId} and (b.category_type = 2 or b.category_type = 3) and c.company_id = #{companyId} and b.status = 0 order by a.seq,b.seq
